speaker: Anvil Trial
lines: You heat the bar and lay it on the anvil.
You strike and watch the color fade from red to orange.
You raise a bevel along the edge.
Scale flakes away; you brush it clear.
You straighten a bend and check your line.
The anvil answers your hammer with every blow.
You can stop now and call it a lesson.
Or you can strike once more and call it yours.

choices.text: Drop it and pick a fight with your impatience.
